description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是使學習者：具備科學發展史的基本知識；認識科學研究的方法與態度；知道目前科學理論下的宇宙形成、發展、與未來；認知生命科學和物理科學對人類生活互動關係；具備現代人類所應具備的科學素養。
description.en: This course will have some effects for students that learn the basic knowledge of development historic science, and study the methodology and attitude of science research, know the formation, development, and future of universe in science theories at the present day, cognize the interactions of the life science and physics science to human existence, have got the scientific literacy of the be of modern human.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹製造流程編排、可程式控制系統、資料傳輸及局部迴路系統、數值控制、數值控制編程、工業機器人、人工智慧、整合製造系統（CIM）。
description.en: Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Integrated Manufacturing System.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。CAD/CAM介紹、CNC工具機、機械手、無人搬運車、自動倉庫、自動檢驗、工廠自動化、CIM、工廠管理、物料管理、工具管理、生產管理等。
description.en: Introduction of CAD/CAM, CNC Machine Tools, Robots, AGVs, Automatic Storage/Retrieval Systems, Automatic Testing, Factory Automation, CIM, Factory Management, Material Management, Tool Management, Production Management.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。系統匯流排（匯流排之時序、匯流排之負載及驅動能力）、序列系統介面（8251可程式通信介面）、平行系統介面（8251可式程式週邊介面）、A/D &D/A 介面、系統中斷 DMA(Direct Memory Access)介面 、通訊訊號介面（RS232、RS422、電流迴路）、區域性網路（區域性網路概論、區域性網路的使用方法、區域性網路方式及目的）、區域性網路的基礎技術、通訊線路及信號、資料交換規則、匯流排網路的特性及分析。
description.en: System Bus (Bus Timing, Bus Loading, Bus Driven), Serial Communication Interfaces (8251 Programmable Communication Interfaces), Parallel Communication (8255 Programmable Peripheral Interface), A/D & D/A Interface, Interrupt System, Direct Memory Access Controllers Communication Interface (RS232, RS422, Current Loop), Local Networks (Introduction of Networks Technology, Communication Circuit and Signals, Data Switching Techniques, Network Performance & Analysis).

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。

description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.en: Introduction to Special Material Processing Methods, including Electrical-Discharge Machining, Laser-Material Processing, Chemical Machining, Electrochemical Machining, Electron-Beam Machining, Hydrodynamic Machining, the Principle as well as the Technologies of each Process will be discussed.

description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。金屬表面電鍍、陽極處裡、熱浸塗覆與擴散塗覆、金屬熔射、化成塗覆、氣相化學層積、離子鍍及離子注入、合板包覆、磷酸鹽塗覆、搪瓷、表面性質測試。
description.en: The technology of Surface Treatment can be classified as follows:1.The fundamental of Electroplating theory and experiments.2.Physical processes and experiments.3.Chemical processes.4.Low temperature plasma techniques.5.Thermal spraying processes.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。運動方程式、一維振動（自由及強制）、振動量測、二維振動、多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced),Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本實習課程設計,讓學生經由儀器及裝置的操作印證理論,內容包含物理化學.聚合物合成,高分子物性檢測,環工檢測技術,生化發酵技術,表面化學技!,乳化技,電化學技術以及有機物合成與分析技術等.
description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 選修介紹材料通性、分類與應用，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之技術。
description.en: This course is concerned primarily with the synthesis, properties, and technology of synthetic polymers. Topics include polymerization, structure and properties, characterization , and properties of commercial polymers

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en: The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Specialemphasis is given to the structuring effects of processingon polymer morphology and properties.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 本課程介紹X射線特性、繞射原理及X射線繞射在材料科學上之應用。內容包括X射線之產生，X射線之性質，X射線之繞射理論，材料之晶體結構與繞射條件。在X射線繞射方法方面則介紹Laue照相法，粉末法，繞射儀及光譜儀等。應用方面則包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等。
description.en: Introduction to the following topics: 1. Properties of X-Ray2. Geometry of Crystals3. Principles of X-Ray Diffraction4. Experimental Methods　(Diffractometer Measurements, Powder Photographs, and Laue Photographs)5. Applications of X-ray Diffraction on Materials Science (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies thermaldynamics to calculate the chemical potential energy of condensedphase and its balance, escape pressure, activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metallic solution, phase diagram and phase change. It also utilizes computer simulated phase reaction and phase diagram, and studies the mathematic model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛生等項目。
description.en: With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgyindustry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the majorpurpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding tothe complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definitionof powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristicsof powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation.

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals. The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 由基本應力、應變分析等之介紹，進而介紹岩石的物理性質及其實驗方法，包括耐蝕性、耐凍性、力學性質(抗壓、抗拉、抗撓、抗剪、內磨擦角、凝聚力)、硬度、容積性質、靜態與動態彈性係數、潛變性。並介紹彈性破壞理論。
description.en: introduction to rock mechanics

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: The course mainly targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the metallics, ceramics, polymer,composite material. Its content includes the crystal structure and defect, atomic diffusion of the solid materials, phase diagrams and phase transformation, material manufacturing process and application, the physic property(optical, electrical, magnetical and thermal property), mechanical property(strength, ductility& maleability, hardness, toughnesss, fatigue, and creep), strenthening structure and method.

description.zh: 課程內容包括電腦概論、程式語言以及套裝軟體之使用。
description.en: The major course includes the brief introduction of computer, computer language and the  application of package software.

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程討論化學分析之相關理論，計算及操作。包括分析中之誤差，統計，重量法，体積法，水溶液，活性，平衡及平衡之計算，沉澱滴定，氧化－還原反應及電化學等基礎探討。
description.en: The course discusses the relating theory, calculation and operation of the chemical analysis, which includes analysis error, statistics, weight method, volume method, solution, activity, equilibrium and the calculation of equilibrium, settling titration, oxidization-reduction reaction, and electrical chemistry.

description.zh: 主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main target is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 本課程包括土壤之工程性質、岩石之工程性質、地下水之生成及對工程之影響、工程地質調查之基本原則及各種調查方法簡介等。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of geology. Application examples are introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal structures. Application examples are  introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 配合顯微組織學課程，使學生從實際顯微組織觀察中，依據相圖的理論觀念，分析和判斷材料的基本特徵。藉由應用顯微鏡設備，結合試片製作與處理的技術，從事試片構造的觀察，據此作為熱處理物件之分析，塑性加工或鑄件之研判，是為本課程的訓練目的。實習內容含括影片教學，熱電偶之測定與應用，熱分析法、以及試片的製作與處理等實作練習。
description.en: This course is to introduce Microstructure Practices.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh: 本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 上水道工程為當前國家重要之工程建設,本課程主要包括管渠系統設計及污水處理系統設計,授課內容涵蓋暴雨逕流計算,管渠水力學及管線系統設計,污水處理系統之規劃,污水處理單元之設計,固體物之處理與處置以及水回收再利用等重要基本知識.
description.en: The objective of this course is going to introduce the Sewage Engineering.

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
使同學對土壤性質及受力後之行為有所認識，進而應用至基礎工程。課程內容：土壤成因、土壤物理及指數性質、土壤分類、滲透與滲流、土層內之應力分析、土壤壓縮、土壤剪力強度、側向土壓力、淺基之土壤承載力分析、邊坡穩定分析、土壤夯實。
description.en: Soil exploration and groundwater sampling;in-situ determination of properties using the split spoon,cone,dilatometer,pressuremeter,and vane equipment.Instrumentation for monitoring field performance and challeges associated with exploration and monitoring ingeotechnica/geoenvironmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程以計算力學之理論為經，結構分析之方法為緯，教導修習學生將結構學之基本觀念徹底融通。其內容主要在說明變分原理，應用於結構分析之原理及方法，並介紹計算力學與古典力學應用於結構分析之差別及優點，使學生能對結構力學有更深刻的瞭解。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生營建工程生命週期的各種管理技能,諸如規劃,設計,發包,施工等階段的相關管理技術都會加以探討,學生可藉由學習課程的過程而體會營建工程的管理精義.
description.en: This course will introduce management techniques during life cycle of construction engineering. All relative techniques in each process of plan,design,contract and construction will be discussed. Students can learn the capability of engineering management after this class.

name.en: State-the-art Constrution of Civil Engineering Techniques

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義 2.廢棄物分類收集與清運 3.焚化處理 4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置 6.特殊處理方法 7.廢棄物處理廠之規劃
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students ,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal, focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include: Definition and classification of waste. Storage and transportation, Incineration, Fixation, Landfill and Overall planning of treatment plant.

description.zh: 目的在使學生瞭解電腦基本知識及程式撰寫方法，以應用於土木工程問題之處理與解決。授課內容包括：電子計算機概論、資料型態、程式語言、輸出入陳述與格式、迴圈及副程式、檔案開啟，及其他應用套裝軟體之介紹。
description.en: Specifications of language syntax and semantics by grammars and automata and by attribute grammars,denotational semantics,and action equations;algebraic,denotational,and operational semantics,application of formal specifications to construction of software tools.

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 土木工程師到底是大地的彫刻師？還是地球的劊子手？透過本課程的介紹與討論，將可使未來的土木工程師及早在「利用厚生，利國利民」與「尊重自然與保護人類」之間思考其應尋的方向，擺脫「一群有知識的野蠻人」之惡名，達成「永續利用」與「天人合一」建設目標。
description.en: How can Civil Engineer construct the infrastracture without destroying environmental system ? In this course,we try to search and discuss the suitable solutions.

description.zh: 使同學進一步獲得土壤力學之重要觀念與理論，授課內容含粘土礦物、滲透與滲流、土壤內之應力分析、壓密理論與沈陷分析、剪力強度應力軌跡與土壤之側向土壓力、邊坡穩定分析。
description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 結構設計之原則及理念,載重與阻抗因子設計法(LRFD)之觀念與理論,鋼結構之型式及材料,拉力構件,壓力構件,梁,梁柱,接合之設計.
description.en: Principles and philosophies of structural design,concepts and theories load and resistance factoe design. typs and materials for steel structures. tension member. Compresion members,beams,beam-columns,connections.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 說明在紡織製程中各種不同之生產流程，並嘗試改善反應性與彈性為主以符合消費者在尖端紡織複合材料之需求。此課程內容將針對在紡織製程中軟硬體之整合，維繫依地球觀之供給者與消費者間之資訊流通，針對元件製作之檢視、測量與評估在各種不同環境變化下之發展標準及生產性之改善。
description.en: Various productiom processes in textiles manufacturing are under investigation and are being subjected  to critical review in an attempt to  improve responsiveness and flexibility to meet consumer needs and desires on the advanced textile composites.This course will focus on:hardware and software linkages within the textile;maintaining a global perspective of information flow between suppliers and consumers;developing criteria for examining ,measuring and assessing the effects of changing environments on assemble operation; productivityimprovements.

description.zh: 講述和討論織物特殊功能性質之整理加工技術。
description.en: The finishing techniques of specific functional properties of fabric are described and discussed.

description.zh: 染料發色理論，染料類別與性質，染料中間體，偶氮染料之製備以及分散、反應、直接等染料之結構與性質之介紹與說明。
description.en: It covers the chromophores. Colour Index intermediates and properties of different kinds of dyes.  The details of preparention of azo dyes,disperse dyes and reactive dyes and also described.

description.zh: 以纖維與染料間的染色化學，糊料的流變性，及纖維的物化為基礎，講述各種纖維的印花方法，如直接印花，防拔染印花，此外並介紹新的印花技術。
description.en: Based on Rheology of thickening, physical/chemical of Fabrics and Dyeing Chmistry between Dyestuff and Fiber. Studing Textile printing method, such as Direct printing style, Resist and Discharge printing style etc., moreover; studing to apply new textile printing technology.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線理論2.微波網路分析3.阻抗轉換與匹配4.微波諧振器5.功率分配與方向藕合器6.微波濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission Line Theory 2.Microwave Network Analysis3.Impedance Transformation and Matching4.Microwave Resonators5.Power Dividers and Directional Couplers6.Microwave Filters

description.zh: 本課程可視為電磁學之延續，介紹電磁波在各種媒質及結構中的傳播特性，以及這些現象在通訊科技之應用，討論主題如下：1.馬克斯威爾方程式之複習，2.電磁場與材料之互作用，3.電磁波於線性／非線性、全向性／異向性與均勻／不均勻材料中之傳播，4.導波管與共振腔，5.微波電路。
description.en: 1.Maxwell equations2.Magnetic fields and materials3.EM wave propagation in linear/nonlinear materials4.EM wave propagation in homogeneous/hetrogeneous materials5.Em wave propagation in isotropic/anisotropic materials6.Waveguides and resonators7.Microwave circuits

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1.電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹;2.材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹;3.向量數學分析之複習;4.馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力;5.靜電場之介紹;6.靜電問題之解決;7.靜磁場之介紹;8.靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis.  Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed.  It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 如何在眾多激烈競爭的企業中脫穎而出，擬聚團隊的共識，發揮企業最大的力量，而創造出一個有競爭力的企業。
description.en: The objective of this course is to learn how to creat the common view sense of firm. Hence the firm could be powerful and competitive.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 多媒體課程在教導使用與應用電腦以交談式、高效率的方式，處理文件、聲音、影像、圖片等資料，本課程包含下列主題：基本語音處理技術、基本影像處理技術、交談式處理、多媒體設計原理、多媒體硬體介紹、多媒體軟體介紹。
description.en: The multimedia system course is to study the use of computers to efficiently and interactively process the documents, audio, video, graph, picture data.  It encompasses the following topics. 1.Basic audio information processing techniques 2.Basic video information processing techniques 3.Interactive processing 4.Multimedia design principles 5.Multimedia hardware introduction 6.Multimedia software introduction

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 介紹工程及管理等相關套裝軟體之使用，以便應用此軟體工具處理相關資料，包含 Word Processor ， Word ， Lotus， Window ， SAS ， Power point 等。
description.en: Introduction to the software package frequently used, including MS Word, Excel, Power Point, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，組織與管理之重要理論，未來發展趨勢及理論與實務之配合技巧等。課程主要目的為：、啟迪管理哲學和觀念、以分組個案研討方式加強分析、解決問題及決策的能力，、以口頭報告來訓練表達和溝通能力，、訓練對企畫案及其他書面報告之寫作技巧，、塑造管理人員應具備的信念、特質、意志及工作倫理。
description.en: The course is to make the studendts realize :1.the progress of management,2.the important theories and the future,3.the applications technique,The objects of this course:1.realize the philosophy of management,2.emphasize the analysis ability of case studies,3.emphasize the problem-solving and decision-making abilities,4.the abilities of presentation and communication with oracle report,5.the abilities of project-writing,6.the abilities of a management manager supported to be,including belief,characters,wills and the working manners .

description.zh: 電腦繪圖應用：本課程適用於一般大專之電腦繪圖課程。其目的在說明電腦繪圖原理之基本觀念，及其相關之應用。本課程授課主題包括：電腦繪圖系統簡介、二度空間轉換問題、視窗、繪圖區域之處理、互動式電腦繪圖系統設計、三度空間轉換問題、隱藏現方法。
description.en: Computer Graphics Applications： This is an undergraduate course dealing with computer graphics.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of computer graphics theory and its applications.The main topics of this course are introductionof computer graphic system,two-dimemtional transformation,windowing,segments,interactive graphic systemdesign,three-dimemtional transformation,hidden line methods.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 設計者、使用者與產品三者之間之產品語言認知、表達及溝通之理論、知識與應用方法之傳授。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory, knowledge, and applications of cognition, expression and communication of product language for designers and users.

description.zh: 以工業設計的工作領域為範圍，藉由個案討論方式使學生熟練設計管理中有關方針之形成、計劃、聯繫、監督、評價、形象策略與控制、再教育、人事管理及合約等技術,設計的組織雖與決策，設計過程之管理，設計政策與產品策略之訂定，溝通技巧及設計之法律問題。。
description.en: This courses contents identifies specific topic areas: Nature of Design Work and its management, Quality by Design, Design in a Business Context, Legal Aspects of Design, Design Policy Making.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: The course uses the practical project to help students to build independent research , design and experiment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 以實務應用的角度，幫助同學瞭解市場調查的涵義，發展及進行程序。其次以實際演練的方式，透過問卷的設計及發放，蒐集相關資料，並協助同學應用EXCEL軟體，將市調所得資料進行整理、分析與解釋，最後以市場調查綜合個案報告之演練方式，以培養同學市場調查相關活動的基本概念與能力。
description.en: To help th3 students to know the connotation, development and procedure of markting Research by th3 view of practice application. Seconday,help the students to design and distribute the questionnaire by the way of coses practice. To collect, anslysis and explain the datas of market survey by application of EXCEL software. Finally, to develop the student's abitity and basic concept of the activity of Marketing Research by the way of cases report and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生坡地開發建設所需具備之相關知識，課程的內容主要的是承續坡地計畫的相關主題，但以從事實務工作所需之內容為主。授課主題涵蓋：1.基地調查與分析（包括自然與生態環境）2.基地開發之工程 3.基地開發之成本分析 4.環境影響評估 5.基地開發之相關法規 6.案例分析。
description.en: The course is intended to train the students to be able to establish a safe and high-quality hillside buildings. The primary contents include(1) influential factors of hillside environment, (2) planning and design stage strategic,(3) construction process, (4) maintenance works, and (5) regulation

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 本課程期望在有限時間內對高層建築中較重要且特有的工種，如：剛構造施工、帷幕強工程、防火披覆工程、高層營建管理等加以介紹
description.en: This course purpose to introduce special and important construction method in Construction of High-Rise Building which involves Steel Structural Engineering, Curtain Wall Engineering, Fireproofing Engineering and Construction Management of High-Rise Building, etc.

description.zh: 一、基本觀念：1.生活、空間與建築。2.建築類型與設計的關係。二、各種建築類型分析：1.商業設施2.辦公大樓3.飯店、旅館4.學校建築5.圖書館。
description.en: 1.The basic conception: a. Living, Space and Architecture. b. The relation between building and design. 2.The analysis of the building types: a. Commercial facility. b. Office building. c. Hotel. d. School building. E. Library.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 一、	本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、	講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、	講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1.	This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2.	The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture.   3.	The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometries ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color shape

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。（上學期）
description.en: Text,image,audio,video are common used to transmit information now.How to organize and repreaent these different kind of data becames an important issue.This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:theories in relation to site planning;design sequences of site planning;investigations and analyses of the sites;planning and designing methods and their evaluations;1.	environmental impact assessment;2.	cases studies.

description.zh: 景園建築是一種自有人類生活以來便已存在的古老活動之一，隨人類文明的發展本項專業領域的探討對象與形式從個人主觀式的庭園到公共性的開放空間；與大地的關係也從破壞環境到尊重自然；工作的發展，變得更專業、更需不同專業團體運作的模式。環境規劃設計是由許多不同專業與技術領域的共同參與，其課題常錯綜複雜不易分割，且隨科技工藝的進步，所以自然也必項有專業分工的觀念，景園建築因工作對象、研討課題與理論，成為不可或缺的環境工作專業團隊之一，但這也是目前一般建築科系學生較弱的一環。本課程屬一學年課程，上學期課程主要包括景園建築領域的主要構成架構、簡要的發展歷程、古典造園景觀史、及配合各課程主題之個案解析等內容；下學期著重園景建築重要代表性案例的評析及其理論與實務之探討，尤其希望就建築系同學的角度加強介紹較重要的各種景園建築技術與個案的介紹；此外，上下學期各有一次專業參觀，使各理論與工法有機會現地實務性對照性研討，促進各主題之融會慣通。課程進行主要分為三個階段：首先，介紹各主題課程重要觀念及內容；第二部分，評析代表性景園個案及專題，以加強理論的融會貫通；最後就所介紹課程主題及案例雙向討論，並探討各重要景園主題
description.en: Landscape Architecture is one of oldest actions of mankind. It is exiting with human life for a long time. There are some main developments of field, First is objectives from personal space to public open space, second is the correlation between man and environment is replaced destroying the nature by respecting the nature. The technique of the job is more professional, need different group to engage in Environmental planning and design needs many different techniques to engage in and to dissolve problem with together. The stages of the course proceedings include three parts: First to introduce the development concept and history of the field, second to introduce some real case studies about the prior course. Last to analysis and discuss each other on the principal theory concerning the topics, in order to understand the current important inclination of L. A. ,  to apply on environmental planning and design, and to be referred about professional cooperation with L.A.

description.zh: 一、說明環境心理學的意義、發展背景、適用範圍及研究架構，並介紹環境心理學的方法論及在建築規劃設計上之運用；二、針對環境心理學與實質環境相關之重點課題，研討視覺美學、特性使用者活動行為模式、群居型態社交行為、空間場所性能體認等現象與實質設施需求之互動關係，並由實際案例之研討、模擬，以熟悉調查、觀察之操作。
汽車設計概要，設計通則、材料，製造與設計的關係，汽車強度基準，引擎、底盤組件及車身之設計。
description.en: An Outline of Automotive Design， A Generality of Design，Relationships between Material，Production and Design，Standard of Automotive Strength，Design of the Components of Engine，Chassis and Body.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

name.en: Administration and management of car manufacturer

description.zh: 車廠佈置, 服務管理, 經營管理, 人事管理。
description.en: Workshop layout, service management, business management, personnel management.

description.zh: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
description.en: Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程:4403053或負責教授同意本徵值與本徵函數，向量分析，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程，複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 先修課程:4403054或負責教授同意流體機械總論、輪機機械之歐拉理論總升程、及設計原理，相似定律及比速率、水輪機、各種泵之升程、功率，效率及損失，泵原動機功率設計，特性曲線、孔蝕現像、水鎚作用，軸之平衡。空氣機械、流體聯結器與扭拒變速器、油壓及氣力機具。
description.en: Introduction and Classification of Fluid Machines, Turbo-machinery Analysis (Including the Angular Momentum Principle, Euler's Turbo-machine Equation, Velocity Polygon Analysis), Performance Characteristics ( Including Performance Parameter, Dimensional Analysis and Specific Speed, Similarity Rules, Cavitation and Net Positive Suction Head (NPSH) ), Introduction to Water Turbine , Introduction to Pumps, Introduction to Air Machinery, Introductionto Fluid Coupling and Fluid Torque Converter, Introduction to Oil Hydraulic and Pneumatic Machinery or Equipment.

description.zh: 運動方程式，一維振動（自由及強制），振動量測，二維振動，多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced), Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple- Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 冷凍空調之風管、水管、冷媒管、隔熱、油漆及無塵、無菌室等系統之零件及材料各種性質、規格、如何選用與相關法規。
description.en: Introduction of parts, material properties, specification, selection and related applicable codes for refrigeration and air conditioning system which includes ducting, water piping, refrigerant piping, thermal insulation, painting and clean room.

description.zh: 本科目將由基本吸收式系統內，相關作動媒體及冷媒之行為等認識，進而學習更具高效率之各種形式吸收式系統裝置上之最佳設計能力。並且利用能源有效利用手法，導入冷熱系統工程上之實際應用規劃，以期發揮吸收式系統在各類狀況下的最能節省能源總體成本之特性。
description.en: The absorption heat pump, mainly based on absorption refrigerating machine in its cycle, is well-accepted with growing demand in air conditioning or process heating market.As the absorption cycle is a kind of heat process reaction, the absorption heat pump has wider application than any other heat pump systems have. This course outlines the classification, theory and characteristics of the absorption heat pump.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human comfort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其應用系統，內容涵蓋如下：一 冷凍工程原理及系統。二 食品冷凍工業。三 工業冷凍。四 超低溫冷凍系統與應用。五 冷凍運輸。六 特殊冷凍應用。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system application. The contents cover the following topics:1 The principles and system application of refrigeration   engineering.2 Food refrigeration.3 Industrial refrigeration.4 Extra-Low-Temperature refrigeration system and application.5 Transport refrigeration.6 Special application of refrigeration.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions:two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fludic control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 各種冷凍空調用熱交換器之介紹，熱交換器應用分析，熱交換增強簡介，鰭電分析，熱交換效率分析及熱交換器結垢問題分析。
description.en: Introduction to the heat exchangers used in HVAC & R, application of heat exchangers, heat exchange enhancement analysis, fin analysis, heat exchange efficiency analysis, and discussion on fouling of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換   ，特殊函數。 二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。 三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。 五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and    higher order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixes and       Determinants, Eigenvalue problems. 3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary    ValueProblems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

name.zh: 冷凍空調熱力熱傳學(一)

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 今日的環境是多變的，不連續的國際化的，今日的在學學生未來畢業後所面臨的是動態的挑戰，工科學生除了學好本科的學識外，也應有對應未來不可知的社會的能力。"市場導向"已是每個人耳熟能詳的詞，工業行銷將帶給工科學生一個瞭解此領域，並能於未來予以駕馭的基本認知。課程內容涵括：1.個體經濟概論2.總體經濟概論3.工業行銷導論4.分析行銷導論5.目標市場的研究與選擇6.行銷策略設計7.組織購買8.行銷方案之規劃9.行銷活動的組織、執行與控制10.行銷管理（社會與倫理構面）11.國際貿易理論
description.en: In today's everchanged, discontinued and globolized environment, the students should face a seicsemic challenge, when they step down from commencement ceremony, how to be well prepared for unknown future become a serious and critical issue to the young generations.For the students in engineering school, the class of industrial marketing may bring them the basic concept and approach to dealing with future career planning.The course include:1.Introduction of micro-economy2.Introduction of macro-economy(To be continued)3.Introduction of industrial marketing4.Analyzing marketing opportunities5.Research and selecting target market6.Designing marketing strategies7.Organizational; purchasing8.Planning marketing program9.Organizing, implementing and controlling marketing effort10.Marketing management: Social and ethical dimension11.The theory of international trade

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is introduce that how to use resource about inside of Business and staff. It's including ability, knowledge, technology, attitude and encourage. To harmony with tactics and form of entirety business. The context of course have Human Resources Analysis, tactics and goal, support to operating about how to get, developing, rewards, and maintain of human resources.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解各財務報表如何分析以及關係到貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、 使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項。
description.en: This course has provided how to analyze Financial report and relate with money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 電子商務的應用與發展已對企業經營與生活方式造成相當大的衝擊，在網路發展先驅與先行導入區域已逐漸將網路應用納入企業日常運作以及居家生活中的一部份。這些應用無論我們從媒體(media)功能、通路(channel)功能來區分，或是從對象來分為B2B、B2C、C2C以及企業內部之應用，其企業經營的方式與傳統模式有許多的不同，因而也衍生許多有趣、重要課題。
description.en: Introduction to Electronic Commerce (E-commerce)- information evolution- information network, telecommunication and business - information society (4C)‥ Discussion of business to business operations (Extranet)‥ Discussion of business to consumer services (Internet) and internet marketing ‥ Discussion of organization management and control (Intranet)‥ Discussion of e-commerce systems and technology support

description.zh: 資料庫系統課程包含1.資料庫概論、2.資料庫系統結構、3.設計邏輯資料模式、4.資料庫操作、5.資料庫管理系統實作問題、6.資料庫設計、7.資料庫管理、8.資料庫工具介紹、9.分散式資料庫與網路介紹、10.資料庫管理系統個案討論。
description.en: In the course of DataBase Management System (DBMS),the following topics will be included as1.Overview of DBMS;2.Architecture of DBMS;3.Design the logical model;4.Operational database;5.Implementation of DBMS;6.Database design ;7.Data management;8.Tools of DBMS;9.Introduction of distributed database and networking;10.Case study.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of soving related problems.The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics:linear programming , network analysis , dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory,non-linear programming , markevo chain,,wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliabity,decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，建立修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a basis in the methods and applications of general statistical. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
description.en: The course is to make the students realize :1. The progress of management,2. The theories of management,  3. The future of management.The topics of this course:1. Organization and management.2. Philosophies of management.3. The function of management.4. Communication.5. The future of management.6. Case studies.

description.zh: 物流管理： 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。 本課程之內容如下： 1.物流管理和策略 2.運輸和配送 3.保管與包裝 4.定單處理 5.採購 6.物料搬運 7.物流成本 8.物流服務 9.資訊系統 10.物流生產力衡量 11.個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics Management: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2.Transpor totion 3.Inventory maintenance 4.Order processing 5.Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7.Materials handling 8.Logistics costs 9.Logistics customer service 10.Productivity measurement .11.Case study.

description.zh: 商業自動化課程的目的在研習所有自動化技術在商業上的應用，其包含下列主題： 1.商品條碼 2.商業資訊化 3.電子資料交換 4.加值網路 5.商店自動化物流技術 6.商店自動化技術整合。
description.en: The business automation course is to study the use of automation technology on business application.It covers the following topics. 1.Business bar coding. 2.Business information systems. 3.Electric data exchange. 4.Value-added networking. 5.Product flow techniques in store automation. 6.Automation technology integration in store automation.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 機構、機械設計、古典動力學、熱力學第一定律及熱平衡、潤滑與摩擦、機械加工、機電系統匹配、機械負載等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Mechanism and Mechanical design, Classical Dynamics, Thermal Analysis, lubrication and wear, Mechatronic system design and practice.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

name.zh: 土壤與結構物互制行為
name.en: Interactive Behavior between Soil and Structure

description.zh: 土壤與結構物之間的界面有應力的存在，該應力的大小與土壤及結構物的力學性質有關，也與結構物的變形有關.列如:地下室開控過程中，擋土結構物的變形，擋土牆的變位,基樁的變位等等。
description.en: The stress between soil and structure depends on the mechanical properties of soil and structure,and also influence the deformation of structure. Such as the excavation of basements and piles etc...

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境。
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commerical environment. Also, by applying the buisness procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 行銷看待是設計工程─它的組合由集成資料、模式、分析和電腦模擬設計一個有效的行銷規劃。我們的教學焦點：l 定義及介紹行銷工程與網路行銷l 策略性行銷l 戰術性行銷l 結合傳統行銷概念和新的網路行銷包括討論、遞送和技術。
description.en: Marketing resembles design engineering ─it consists of putting together data, models, analysis, and computer simulations to design effective marketing plans. We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 本課程提供生產系統與管理研究所碩士班有關數量方法的核心課程。它敘述各種觀念，計量方法及控制在各種不同產業的應用。本課程不需特別數學先修課程。
description.en: This course is intended primarily for use in the quantitative methods course as a core requirement in master's degree program of system engineering and management .It draws upon a broad and varied industrial base as a fame of reference for the application of concepts , analytical techniques ,and controls . This course does not require any previous college-level mathematical background.

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

name.en: Analysis and modeling of air distribution

description.zh: 非黏性流場分析，氣流質量、動量與能量守恆統御方程式，熱浮力分析，氣流模型分析，紊流之理論基礎分析，紊流之解析方程式，數值分析方法簡介
description.en: Inviscid flow distribution, mass conservation, momentum conservation, energy conservation, analysis of buoyancy effects, flow modeling, turbulence basics, solutions to turbulence flows, introduction to numerical methods.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。
description.en: The nature of business research、scientific method、conceptual foundations of research、theory and research、elements of research and research process、research problem and hypothesis、literature review and variable of research、constructing operational definitions、measurement、modeling theoretical structures、research design、 research proposal、survey research、questionnaires、interview technique、documentary historical method and observation、case study、scaling、experiment、data analysis、univariate analysis and general statistical analysis、multivariate analysis、the interpretation of data、research report、policy implication of business research

description.zh: 資訊管理是一門較新的管理學門，在電腦早期發展時期，只有專業電腦人員才會懂得如何操作電腦，但隨著資訊科技的進步，個人電腦的普及，一般非資訊人員也可以很容易操作與使用電腦。然而會用電腦不見的對企業有所幫助，思考資訊科技如何給企業帶來競爭優勢是資訊管理領域所考慮的重要議題。一般來說，資訊管理主要探討企業如何對資訊系統及資訊人員作最有效的管理，以其與企業目標結合，替企業增加競爭優勢。本課程即站在管理與策略的角度分析企業應如何對資訊資源（包括資料、資訊系統與資訊人員）做最有效的管理，上課方式將採用個案研討為主，以期學生能瞭解理論與實務的發展。
description.en: This course will discuss how the organizations gain their competitive advantage through Information Technology. It covers the following three major parts: Part 1:Information System Planning. Part 2: Information System Management in the Organization. Part 3: Strategic use of Information System Part 4:Electronic Commerce and strategic impact.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
