description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究
name.en: Practical Study of Occupation Analysis & Guidance

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 研究開放與遠距教學系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探討不同生涯階段的學習者運用開放與遠距教學系統的成功教學策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the components of open & distance instruction, including historical development, current status, and perspective of distance education. Exploration of successful learning strategies for the learners using open & distance instruction systems in different career stages.

description.zh: 探討教育研究方法，培養研究的基本能力,具備研究的正確觀念與態度,本課程將探索質與量的研究、研究設計、取樣與量測、並設計了許多討論,實作和報告的活動,以結合研究方法的知識探討與實作技能。
description.en: An introduction to the process and methods of educational research and to developing a plan or proposal for research in the field. Topics include qualitative and quantitative research traditions, structure of a research article, research problem literature review and the role of Theory.

description.zh: 教育評鑑範圍、目的、嚴格與發展，評鑑策略、評鑑結果分析及應用。
description.en: In depth study of objectives, scopes, development, strategies of educational evaluation, and the application & analysis of the result in evaluation.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校科層體制、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究，及其相關實務之研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school soscial system; school departmental hierarchy; school atomsphere; school leadership;studies of school efficiency; as well as practice of educational administration.

name.en: Research in Theories of Technial-Vocational Education

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的理論基礎、本質與特性研究。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生涯教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響，並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Examination of objectives, foundation, basic theories and distinction in technical-vocational education. Topics include competency analysis, cluster analysis, cooperative program, life education, and career counseling. In depth study of background, current issues, trends, and conclusion or implication underlying main research in technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展實務研究
name.en: Studies in Practice of Curriculum Development in Technical-V

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評鑑等實務研。
description.en: Tednds in methodology for desinging, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at  vocational high school and community college levels; as well as practice research.

description.zh: 探討我國技職教育發展的背景、組織及影響；西洋技職教育的發展沿革、歷程、關鍵人物及其影響之研究。
description.en: To study the historical development of Vocatinal-Technical Education(VTE) in major country; focusing on educational background. System and individuals  influencing VTE.

name.zh: 技職學校行政實務研究

description.zh: 技職學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Introduction to the fields of technical-vocational school administration. Topics include historical development of technical-vocational educational administration, theories of technical vocational educational administration, theories of school social system, school departmental hierarchy, school atmosphere, school leadership, theories of decision-making and communication, studies of school efficiency.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and inter-group behavior; influence processes and planned change. Discussion, case study, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育理論領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends, theories, and research in educational theory. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對技職教育學制領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in technical- vocation education schooling system.

name.zh: 獨立研究--評鑑方案規劃

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 同時段研二專題討論授課老師：黃清孝

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 本課程介紹複合材料的原理，包括複合材料的高分子化學、複合材料的加工方法、複合材料的力學分析與設計、以及複合材料在高科技上的應用。加工方法包括真空袋成型法、壓力釜成形法、樹脂移送成型、編織法、纏繞成形法、拉擠成型法、模壓法…等，本課程詳述這些加工方法的原理及應用，同時介紹力學分析及設計，應力和應變之關係，複材之彎曲、靜態和動態之強度、脫層、耐久性、及以力學觀點設計複合材料，最後討論複合材料如何應用於高科技及民生工業上。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the principle and potential application of composite materials. It includes polymer chemistry, design and analysis of composite, and processing methods. The composite processings include autoclaves,vacuum vags, resin transform molding, braiding, filament winding, pultrusions, sheet molding compound,…etc. The principles and application of the methods will be elucidated. The analysis and design, strain-stress relationships, extension and bending, static and dynamic strengths, and delamination, will also be discussed. Finally, the potential application of the composite in high-tech industries will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

description.zh: 建築和都市的歷史, 理論, 和批評中的課題研究一.現代的 建築二.美國的 建築三.東方的四.建築師五.歷史保存六.技術的,構造的, 和程式性的主題討論。 七.本土建築
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of architecture and urban.A.Pre-ModernB.ModernC.AmericanD.OrientalE.ArchitectsF.Historic PreservationG.Technical, Structural, and ProgrammaticH.Urban DesignI.Vernacular Architecture

name.en: Landscape Design Method of Regional Approach

description.zh: 景觀，從比較完整的角度來看，既是人文的，也是自然的整體表現。現代化的普及知識和普同技術帶來對自然環境的衝擊和地區景觀特色的趨同，已經使得從事景觀設計專業警覺到應該反省當前景觀設計方法和表達的適當性。自從 1960年代以來被景觀建築專業奉為圭鎳的自然環境導向的設計方法已經開始遭到質疑。本課程從地域觀點講述有關的主張與理論；尤其以台灣地區為對象探討特定地區課題，以及依此理念所發展出的這一套設計理論與方法。此一課程的設計方法將可提供有興趣選擇環境設計方向論文的同學可能的觀念性架構。    1.  當代台灣景觀設計思潮與問題    2.  地域性環境規畫設計理論    3.  地域性景觀設計的內涵    4.  地域性景觀設計方法    5.  地域性景觀設計的實務
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below;    1.  Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design     2.  Rationale of the regional planning and design    3.  The body of regional design in landscape    4.  Method of regional approach to landscape design    5.  The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 本課程為建築史研究及寫作的入門課程，內容主要是介紹與歷史研究有關的各種理論與方法，及其運用於建築方面的狀況，目的為訓練研習者建立個人的歷史敘事觀，與從事建築歷史寫作的能力。課程含三大部份：  1.「歷史」意義概說。  2.歷史研究理論與方法研討。  3.建築史名作敘事架構分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the historical study and academic writing on architecture. The main body relates to theories and methods concerning with historical study and the possible application in architecture. It aims at the establishment of a analytical vision and the ability in academic writing in doing research of architectural history. Three parts are concluded:  1. Defining the meaning of 'History'.  2. Exploring the theories of historical studies and            research methodologies.  3. Analyzing the structure of remarkable articles on      'architecture history'.

description.zh: 近年國內營建環境有急遽的變化，政府及民間業者亦有諸多因應措施，如營建自動化、建築生產合理化、開放營建等議題陸續出現。但由於建築學界與業界的隔閡，設計與施工的各自侷限，相關的知識一直未能有效的貫穿，以致效益不彰。建築生產過程的一貫性與完整性考量將是本課程試圖探討的重點，因此將循序漸進的選擇適當的案例，逐步引導討論進入理論分析的層次。課程內容包括：    建築生產的歷史回顧    建築生產的流程與組織    建築生產決策的影響因子    建築生產的整體評估    建築生產的動向
description.en: Our building environment has changed tragically in this year. The government and enterprises do many efforts on issues like construction automation, rationalization of building production, and open building. But the segregation between schools and practices, self-limitation of design and construction, those related knowledge was never passed down effectively, that we still stocked in there.Deal with the whole and totality in the process of building production is our major concern. The course contentsl     A historical review     Process and organization    Factors of decision    A comprehensive evaluation     Future trend

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 本課程旨在(一)探討中西傳統家具造型起源及演化；(二)研究影響各時期家具風格形成的因素，包括社會文化環境、使用材料、結構方法、裝飾手法及其象徵意義等；(三)探尋傳統設計元素在現代家具上的可能應用。
description.en: An in-depth exposure to the origins of form and the evolution of furniture design both in Oriental and Western World; Comprehensive analysis of the characteristics, including specific cultural environment, material used, construction methods, ornamentation, and Symbolism in decoration which define a period style; Study the application of traditional design elements on contemporary furniture.

name.zh: 室內空間與家具設計研究
name.en: Study into Interior Space and Furniture Design

description.zh: 講授人、家具、環境之介面，進而探討室內空間機能、生活機能與家具之關係性。以家具為室內空間中之機能元素之一，探討家具設計之創新思維。
description.en: A general study of interface among man, furniture and environment that related to space function, living function and the use of furniture. Design philosophy of furniture, which is considered as a functional element in interior space, is to be deliberating in the study.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生有關「創新產品設計」之進階知識及實務應用技能，課程包含：產品趨勢推論、本土化產品創新特質及發展，課程並著重在跳躍式、漸進式及綜合式設計案例研究、專案企畫發展、評估與專案管理。
description.en: Principles and Practice of Product Innovation, Product Evolution, Nature of Indigenous Product Innovation and its Development, Case Studies in Radical and Incremental Design in Design Project Planning, Development, Evaluation and Management.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。

Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

name.en: Introduction to History of Western Architecture

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述土地使用管制機制、課題與對策，以為規劃人員或設計者如何以土地使用策略系統來管制實質環境影響及與建築的關係媒介。其內容包括： 一、前言：全球化與歷史性的觀點 二、都市化、聚落形態與中心 三、反都市化及地方自治化 四、都市形態與結構，聚落機能形態 五、聚落發展過程之理論與實務觀點 六、土地使用要素及土地使用者：關聯與衝突 七、住宅、工業、商業發展與交通運輸 八、現代都市改變的壓力與永續發展
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about land use control how a planner/designer uses land-use equipment system to control physical environmental impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium. This course includes: 1. Global and historical context. 2. Urbanization; settlement patterns and centers 3. Counterurbanization and decentralization 4. Urban form and structure; settlement morphology 5. Settlement development process: factors and theoretical perspectives 6. Components and landusers: linkages and conflicts 7. Residential, industrial, commercial development and transportation 8. Contemporary pressures for urban change; sustainability

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在(一)使學生瞭解重要化學品之合成原理與工業上的合成程序；(二)使學生瞭解合成反應與反應機購及工業合成程序的應用。內容包括基本合成原理，有機合成反應，無機合成反應，重要化學品之合成與利用。
description.en: Studies of syntheric principles of chemical and synthetic processes of industry. Chenmical reaction of synthesis, mechanism of chemical reaction, application of processes of industrial synthesis also included.

description.zh: 本課程強調表面化學性質之基本原理及其應用。內容可分成三部份：（一）液體之表面張力、熱力學及有關表面電力方面之性質，潤溼、清潔、乳化及起泡。（二）固體表面化學強調固體表面之生成及鑑定，固液間之接觸角、吸附及溶液表面分子的黏著現象。（三）介紹固氣界面，氣體及蒸汽在固體表面上之吸附，化學吸附及催化。
description.en: The course describes the foundamental principles and the application of Surface Chemistry, which is concentrated in following three major fields:(1) The surface tension, thermodynamics of the liquids and their related electrical properties, wetting, cleaning, emulsification and foaforming.(2) The surface chemistry of solid state emphasizes the formation of a solid surface, its characterzation, the liquid-solid contact angle, the adsorption, and the adhesion phenomena on molecular basis.(3) The interfacial phenomena at the solid-gas interface, the adsorption of gas or vapor on the solid surface, the chemistry of adsorption and the catalysis.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

description.zh: 本課程討論液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括1.液晶之來由及其分類2.液晶之電場與磁場效應3.液晶之光學性質4.液晶顯示器（STN LCD,TFT LCD）及其他應用5.液向型液晶及其在生物體與日常生活體品之應用6.高分子液晶與高強度纖維
description.en: The course is an introduction to Liquid Crystal Materials. Including 1.What are Liquid Crystal? 2.The story of Liquid Crystal；3.Electric and Magnetic Field Effects；4.Light and Nematic Liquid Crystal；5. Liquid Crystal Displays(STN-LCD, TFT-LCD) and other applications；6.Lyotropic Liquid Crystal；7.Polymer Liquid Crystals.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

description.zh: 本課程是為不具化學及化工背景的紡織工程的同學所設計。主要是講授一些基本的有機化學原理、化學品的結構式與命名，以及重要的反應械構。同為係一學期的課程，所以偏重脂肪族與芳香族的介紹。
description.en: This lecture is designed to serve those students in textile engineering and mechanical engineering who must acquire a working knowledge of organic chemistry but do notneed all the detial of the traditional full-year course . Aone-semester course in this field can illustrate the fundamental principles of chemistry,of the structure and nomenclature of matter,and of the factors which govern molecular behavior. The theory and mechanisms of certain reactions have been introduced, especially when it was thought that these might be helpful in explaining to the curious student the "why" of organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成,基本性質,成形,各種加工與應用。
description.en: Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications.

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對梭織、針織與非織工程的原理、流程與終端用途能充分瞭解與認識。其梭織工程內容包括整經、上漿等準備工程及其主要、輔助機構與製織原理等﹔針織工程內容包括紗圈成形元件、緯編與經編等之製織原理。非織工程內容包括乾式、機械式與濕式等之製造方法。織物結構組織和物性之關係,亦被討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students fully understand the theory, process and end applications of major fabric formation system. A comprehensive understanding of fabric structure properties and their evaluation is also discussed.

description.zh: 國內半導體資訊、自動化、化學、精密工業等與日本關係非常密切。日本為世界第二大經濟大國，日文方面科技資料甚多，如能培養學生閱讀科技日文資料，對國內未來科技與工業之發展有莫大助益。本課程內容在於如何收集與閱讀日文方面科技資料，學習時分兩段，基礎篇與應用篇。
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for reading technical information. The course covers: (1)Basic Japanese grammar (2)Japanese technical phrase(3)Technical terminology: semiconductor, information technology, automation, biotechnolpgy, and polymer chemistry.

description.zh: 主要闡釋現代紡織工廠之整體設計理念；其課程內容包括選擇設廠地區之評估要素及其優劣點，規劃紡織工廠廠房之型式，設計紡織工廠之步驟，選定工廠之物料流程，計算及設計紡織各製程所需要設備數，排列紡織工廠之機械流程圖。並講述紡織工廠之溫度、溼度之重要性及標準範圍，配置動力設備、照明設備及空調設備。最後講述如何選擇最新科技化、自動化之紡織機械設備。
description.en: Design of textile factory   The function of this class is mainly to explain the general design concept of modern textile factory, the class the ideas of  selecting the evaluated elements of factory location as well as the advantages and disadvantages,to plan the workshop type of factory,organize the design step of the textile factory, to choosing the material flow of factory,estimating and instructing the amount of demanded equipment for all texile processes,and to lay out the machines flow chart for   texile factory. In addition, the importance and standard range of temperature and moisture,the installation pf dynamics,illumination and air condition are explained.In the end ,there is a description of how to select the most nowadays technolngical and automatic texile mechanical equipment,

description.zh: 從基本的生醫紡織品，如︰縫合線，人工血管，人工腎臟到人造肌膚等，說明其組成，製程，功能以及對生體的作用，另外人體對生醫材料之包容性，分解性，致癌性，毒性等詳細說明和比較。
description.en: Biomedical Textiles, is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability.  Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc.  In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented and compared in detail.

description.zh: 互動設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved Inter-Reaction design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 介紹及討論創造性藝術之特性、藝術與工程間的關連、美學在工程上之重要性以及美的形式原理。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the study and practice of fundamental principles of design in terms of creative arts, relationship between art and engineering, and the importance of aesthetics applying to design.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

name.zh: 高等知識管理與專題研究

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 本課程主要的目的是探討企業如何有效評估經營環境與競爭的本質並建立獨特而持續性的優勢，以啟動企業長期成長及獲利的引擎，利於不敗之地。
description.en: The objective of this class is to study the enterprises；business environment and the contents of computation effectively. To build up the unique advantage and pump the long-term groan profitable engine of the business is the main goal in this topic.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications, 2. robot motion ,analysis and control 3. robot end effectors 4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspection safety, training ,maintenance, and quality.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意半導體元件、整流電路，電晶體和電路，運算放大器、線性積體電路，邏輯元件，數位電路，數位積體電路，微處理器，放大器等。
description.en: Semiconductor Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, Logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc..

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh: 莊子是道家集大成的人物。他的破對待、齊萬物，雖似一異於儒，實則非但與儒相輔相成，且於後來儒說多所啟發。本課程固在使學者能由莊子荒唐之言、無端崖之辭了解莊子，更在使學者能由了解莊子而了解、道會通之處。
description.en: Chuang-tzu is the master figure of Taoism.  His awareness of the relativity of all standards and his belief in the equality of all things look different from Confucianism.  However, in essence, they are complementary to the understanding of Confucianism, and even inspire some of the later Confucianist ideas.  This course intends to focus on Chuang-tzu's absurd remarks and rambling discourses, by which it is hoped that a better understanding of the reciprocity of Taoism and Confucianism can be reached.

description.zh: 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。
description.en: From the early aboriginal society to the immigrant society of the Hans and even to the current society, songs--in different period of times--always play an important role in civil life. In traditional society, folksongs perform the functions of instruction, religion and entertainment. A large number of folksongs serve the gateway to understand the common people.  Though today's pop-songs are the products of entertainment business, they still reflect common people's emotions and values as well as label the mark of social change.  Taiwanese songs (including folksongs and pop-songs) are important texts in this course. Through the analysis of the song lyrics, the students are expected to draw a vivid picture of the social change in the past.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: (一)認識地球與地球科學  1.認識地球的重要性--經驗的與科學的角度2.地球科學家與地球知識3.地球知識的探究範圍--地球的結構(二)地球與星系的有機係4.宇宙的形成與大爆炸5.地球與銀河系6.地球的動力系統--內動力與外動力(三)岩石圈與人類棲居的範圍7.地球的內動力系統與地殼變動8.岩石圈的形成與特徵:從地質到地形9.岩石圈、陸地與人類活動的關係(四)水圈、大氣圈與自然環境皂動力10.水、空氣與土地的互動11.水循環與外動力系統(陽光)12.大氣運動與天氣變化(五)認識地球的本質13.地球作為人類的家14.節制與維護:人與自煞的和諧交往。

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語學習時間達２５時數（新日本語之基礎第５課）的學習者所設。授課使用視聽教材、注重會話及聽力訓練。期使學習者能在各種日常場面的會話練習中、習得正確的日語會話表現。達到會說、會用的教學目標。予定課桯學習目標：形容詞的肯定、否定、存在句、所在句、喜惡句、希望句等句型。
description.en: This is a step-up lesson for Japanese language study; total studying time will be 25 hours. The curriculum will use linguistic teaching equipment, we would emphasize on drilling of conversation practice and listen comprehension practice. We hope our students can learn proper Japanese conversation through a series of daily life conversation practice and finally achieve the purpose of speaking and using Japanese freely. Estimated learning targets: existence sentence, location sentence, comparison sentence, likes and dislikes sentence, expectation sentence etc.------basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本科目屬通識教育之課程範圍，係以系統（System Theory）理論的觀點，針對「開放社會」中的教育問題加以探討。其分析的層面概分為兩大類群，一為鉅視觀點，即從各種社會制度與政策，諸如經濟、政治、階層、資訊、宗教等各方面，分析對於教育的影響與互動關係；另一為微視觀點，即從社會整體對教育各層面，諸如教育目標、學校型態、教師角色、學生學習、家長參與等各議題加以分析其影響性。本課程之預期目標為，透過本課程的安排，得以明析當代開放社會與教育之間，互為變遷動因與條件的實態，進而產生進一步探究的興趣。
description.en: This subject, one of the courses of General Education, aims to analyze the educational issues of an "Open Society" from System Theory perspective. The analysis can be carried out in two ways：first, from macro-viewpoint, it means to study the influences and interrelation that different social institution and policies such as economy, politics, stratification, information, religion, etc. have exerted on education. second, from micro-viewpoint, it analyzes the influences of the whole society on every aspects of education such as education objective, school style, role of teachers, learning of students, participation of parents, etc.Through the programme of this course, we hope to illustrate the fact that the contemporary open society and education are reciprocal factors and conditions of changes.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會民主法治觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課擬從以下方向發展：１．中國歷代政治得失評析：一個治亂興亡的觀點。２．現階段政府所面對的政治、經濟、社會與文化等挑戰３．實際憲政制度之運作對台灣政治發展之影響。４．政治文化與政治社會化研究。５．立憲民主政府的主要類型比較。６．民主憲政與人權保障探源。７．政治參與－政府機關對人民的政治活動。８．民主國家國會結構比較研究。９．從總統委任直選到總統直選－理論與實際。10．現代政治中行政與立法的關係。11．司法正義與司法革新。12．政治發展與政治穩定。
description.en: This course is intended to help students understand the constitutional development of Taiwan, and the relation between tradition and modern period so as to establish democratic concepts in this multi-cultural society.  This course will study the basis of our Constitution, and explore the following items: 1. the Chinese political development 2. what the challenge our government is facing at the present time 3. the consequence and impact of Constitution operation 4. the political culture and political sociology 5. comparison among various constitutional governments 6. democratic systems and human rights 7. political participation--state vs civil society 8. comparisons of the congress of democratic countries 9. theory and practice of the Presidential election systems 10. relation between the executive Yuan and legislation  11. judicial justice and judical reform 12. political development and steadiness.

description.zh: 就人類的歷史來看，生活中某一種活動形式，反復行之，久而成俗；如屬良風美俗，則用禮的形式加以規範，成為禮俗。我國古有冠、昏、喪、祭四禮，從人之始生，教養成人，成家立室，以至慎終追遠，對每個生命中的重要歷程，都訂定一套禮儀制度，展現對生命特有的關懷與尊重。本課程即欲透過這些禮制，探討內涵的精神意義，一則瞭解中國文化重倫理，重理性，重人道的特性，一則秉持古禮的精神，因應社會變遷，建立合乎現代人生活的生命禮俗，從而體悟生命的莊嚴與神聖。
description.en: As is viewed from the human history, a certain active form in life--once repeated constantly--eventually turns into a conventional norm. The forms, if classified as fine or elaborate, are regulated in the format of rituals and then become well-accepted ritual. There used to be four customs in the ancient China: manhood, marriage, funeral, and worship. For each individual stage of a life, beginning from the birth of a man, through the years of growing up and building a family until the ending point of it, a complete system of rituals are constituted to reveal due concern and respect to life as it is. By studying and discussion of these rituals, this course explores the spiritual significance hidden behind, trying to help further understand the Chinese civilization which pays more emphasis on ethics, logic and humanities on the one hand, and on the other hand, to build up new rituals in accordance with the modern society and people and to help people realize the significance of life.

description.zh: 素描是一切繪畫基礎，設計產品，有美的意念，還要有能力將之畫出來，才算完成，否則即成空泛理論。(一)鉛筆練習：線條方向、明暗度變化、立體概念、光影效果等。(二)方形器物練習：以平移法正確掌握立方體造形，並將明暗效果表現出來。(三)圓柱體練習：畫易開罐飲料罐，能繪出其質感效果和細部文字、圖樣。(四)圓形物練習：能把握造形、質感、量感、光澤，以水果為練習對象，如蘋果、橘子等。(五)多種形體練習：如松果、貝殼、落葉等，均能把握其造形、質感、光影特色。由完全沒有概念開始，訓練至有寫生能力，也學得耐心、細心和觀察力。
description.en: Sketch is the base of painting. The product design and concept of beauty must be expressed; otherwise, it will become only a talk.Contents:1.Pencil practicing: lining, chiaroscuro, cubism, lighting, etc.2.Square ware practicing: controlling the cubism styling with a horizontal movement, also, expressing chiaroscuro, etc.3.Cylinder practicing: drawing beverage can with the sense of its quality, detail, and picture.4.Round object practicing: styling, quality, quantity, luster; also, drawing fruit, such as, apple, orange, etc.5.Multiple-shape practicing: such as, pin cines, shell, falling leaves with the sense of styling, quality, lighting, etc.The course is to train students who have are inexperienced to sketch with the ability of patient, detailing, and observation.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹西洋各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，解說各時代之繪畫風格，重要畫家，以及著名建築、雕刻、手工藝等，以幻燈教學，使學生瞭解西洋藝術，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括: 1.史前藝術：包括洞窟藝術、骨雕石雕等。2.上古藝術：如西亞、埃及、希臘、羅馬、波斯、印度等線畫、雕刻、建築。3.中世紀藝術：拜占廷、東羅馬藝術。4.文藝復興：包涵繪畫、雕刻建築、壁畫等。5.十七、八世紀：巴洛克、洛可可時代。6.近代繪畫：如新古典主義、浪漫派、印象派等。7.現代藝術：野獸派、立體派、超現實主義、象徵主義、抽象派、達達派、普普、歐普、新寫實、未來派、構成派等畫派之繪畫。
description.en: The contents of this course are constructed as following :1.Prehistoric Art : including"The Art of Engraving ", "Carving designs on bone ","Carving designs on stone "..etc. 2.Previous Ancient Art: For instance, the painting engraving architecture of Siya, Egypt, Greece, Rome, Persia, India.etc 3.Art of Middle Ages: Art of Byzantine, Art of Rome. 4.Renaissance: including Painting, Engraving, architecture, fresco etc. 5.Seventeenth and Eighteenth Centuries: Periods of Baroque. Rococo. 6.Modern Painting: for instance, Neoclassicism. Romanticism. Impressionism etc. 7.Contemporary Art: The painting of fauve, Cubism, Surrealism, symbolism, Abstract Art, Dada, Pop Art, Op Art, Neorealism, Futurism, Formalism…etc. The interpretation will include styles of different period, important artists, famous architectures, engraving handicrafts and so on. The Slides will be used as a teaching assistance to help students understand Western Art.

description.zh: 小說是文學中重要的一支，而短篇小說更是利用最經濟的文學手段以塑造人物形象，反映社會現實的一種藝術。我國的短篇小說，自唐至清，代有佳作，故本課程即以歷代傑出作品為範疇，選擇最具代表性的篇章，透過閱讀及討論之方式，對其做多層面之探討，以期使受教者能在宏觀方面瞭解其所反映之當代文化及歷史價值，在微觀方面則能欣賞其所體現的文學藝術，最終並能掌握課堂所學，觸類旁通，施用於其他相關領域之學習。
description.en: Fiction is one of the important genres of literature. The novelette is regarded as the most effective means to depict people and reflect the society. From Tan Dynastic to Chiang Dynastic, Chinese classical novelette abounded with great works of fiction. This course aims to introduce some representative works of Chinese classical novelettes. By reading and discussing works of novelettes, we can understand their social background and their value in history in macro view and enjoy their beauty of literature forms in micro view. Students can apply what they learned in this course to their specific field of study.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

name.en: An exploration of the place-names in Taiwan

description.zh: 「台灣」的名稱很可能是由「埋冤」或「埋完」的閩南語演變而來的（台灣的「灣」，本地人均唸第二聲，音如「完」或近「冤」，而不唸原字該唸的第一聲）。早期在台灣幾乎到處可見的「御使崎」地名，其實是緣自當時最普遍的運輸工具「牛車」而來的特殊景觀。  「地名」通常可顯示出當地地形、地物或地貌景觀的特徵。也可能代表了當地特殊的地理現象，更可能隱藏著台灣先民許多胼手胝足、可歌可泣的傳奇和拓荒血淚史。而幾個地名串連起來，也許就訴說了一條我們祖先從閩粵來台，由登陸、轉進、開發以至於定居的路線。  一個地方怎麼會以虐待動物的「打狗」、「打貓」為名？「貴子坑」為何有好多「鬼」故事？基隆為什麼原稱「雞籠」呢？沙鹿、初鹿、鹿草、鹿野、鹿谷、鹿港……等，這麼多地方以「鹿」為名，究竟那裡有鹿？那裡沒有鹿？如果沒有鹿，怎麼會以「鹿」為名呢？南投在南、北投在北，當然是天經地義的事，可是北港在南，南港卻在北，如何令人心服口服呢？台北、台南、台中、台東都有，為什麼獨缺「台西」縣市呢？  總之，台灣地名的來由，真是琳琅滿目、數之不盡，有知識性的，也有趣味性的；有文獻記載的，也有口耳相傳的，請讓我快快道來……。
description.en: The place-names in Taiwan not only tell us the forms of the land, and the superficies of the ground, but also reveals the special geographical phenomena, and much further, the hardship and legendary of our ancestors.The name "Taiwan" could be evolved from the slang - "bury the grievance" or "bury it all" in Taiwanese.  Some places have merciless names such as "thrash the dog", "thrash the cat".  What is the reason that Keelung was ever called "chicken cage"?  We can find many places were named with "deer" in Taiwan, but we cannot see any deer in some of these places today.  I believe that it will be very difficult to convince our people that BeiGang (north port) is in the South and NanGang (south port) is in the North！Altogether, the stories of the place-names in Taiwan are countless and in variety, some of them are knowledgeable, and some are amusing; there are also some from the literature, and some are from legend. The main idea of this course is to help us looking into how various

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程專為主修非生命科學領域的大專學生所設計，透過日常生活常見的現象，介紹生物學幾個主要學門領域的概念，使學習者能夠瞭解生物學知識在生活中的應用。課程以講解、簡易實驗操作、討論和分組報告進行，包括：細胞學、生物技術、人體構造功能、植物構造與功能、生態學。課程的重點在於生物相關訊息的蒐集、理解、資料整理、判讀，希望能夠建立學生接觸非主修領域知識的習慣，有更廣泛和自由的思維。
description.en: This course is designed for non life science major students. Through events usually occur in everyday life, we will explore the relationship between Biology and our daily life. The goal of the course is to create an environment which lets students contact with the field with which they are unfamiliar, and to understand it with interest. Course activities include : lectures, group discussion, simple experiments. The important topics of the course include : cell, biotechnology, human health, horticulture.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 概論2. 鐵路變電所設計3. 電力遙控系統4. 電車線系統設計5. 干擾與防護6. 動力車的電力供應7. 動力車的電力控制8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 說明專案投資之經濟分析與評估，內容:專案投資模式、專案分析準則、投資風險分析、不確定性環境下的投資策略
description.en: This course is to interpret the economic analysis and evaluation of investment project. The main topics include project investment models, project criteria, investment risk analysis, investment decision under uncertainty.

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 電腦能在建築設計過程中發揮很大的用處，雖然專為輔助建築設計所發展的CAD軟體並不多。但是市面上現有的一些軟體像是MS word, MS excel, MS powerpoint, Photoshop, Corel Draw,Max已經可以在設計過程中幫上很大的忙了。本課程分上下兩學期來介紹這些軟體。課程中將針對建築設計過程相關需求，要求同學上機練習實際操作，在實際作業中循步漸進，使同學對CAD有個整體性的認識，了解現階段CAD能做些什麼，未來CAD又可能做到些什麼。
description.en: Computer has being used widely during the architectural design process. Although not many software packages are developed specifically for Computer-Aided-Architecture-Design(CAAD) purpose, we can find out that some well-developed software packages such as MS word, MS excel, MS PowerPoint, PhotoShop, Corel Draw, Max are very powerful tools to serve the purpose.The class will last for two semesters to help students to master the packages mensioned above. It is important to actually log on the systems, practice some architecture related projects to get a general idea of what can CAAD do for the time being and what can it do in the near future.

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程包括下列主題:網路商業環境和未來發展, 網路行銷,網路公關,網路商店之經營, 及線上廣告交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safety.

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 民主政治為法治政治，凡政府各項施政均需有法令依據。行政法，乃是國家各行政機關所適用之各種法令規章之總稱，其內容含蓋國家行政機關之組織、職權、作用、程序及爭訟等事項之法規，範圍至為廣泛，且與人民之權利、義務息息相關。本課程將以系統化、生動化，並輔以實例之方式講授，以啟發同學學習興趣。同學修習本課程，除可增進法治知能與素養外，並可對日常生活之權益維護有重大裨益。
description.en: Democracy is regarded as rule by law nowadays. All official policies that are implemented by government must be based on law. Administrative law is a general term of all kinds of regulations and laws that are suitable for administrative organizations. The content includes of administrative organization in this country. The course serves as extensive rules that are related to people is rights and obligations. The principle emphasis of the course is on the systematic instruction with specific examples tc enlighten students learning interest, furthermore not only promoting knowledge and professional training in law but also effective in daily life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，數位調變及偵測，數據譯碼及錯誤更正碼，同步(載波及時刻訊號的還原)，多工技術，通訊網路技術。
description.en: introduction to design communication systems, digitalmodulation and detection, data signaling and error correction codes, synchronization,multiplexing techniques,communiation networks.

description.zh: 電機分析基本理論，基準座標原理，對稱感應機理論，同步電機理論，同步電機運轉阻抗及時間定數，感應機與同步機線性化運作方程式，同步機簡化運轉方程式，感應機與同步機平衡運作特性，感應機與同步機計算模擬。
description.en: principle of electric machine,d-q axis transformation,theory of symmetrical induction machines and synchronousmachines,linealization of induction and synchronous machineequations,modeling of induction and synchronous machines.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。熔接概念、熔接方法介紹、各種熔接特性、熔銲人員資格及熔接檢驗、熔接控制及熔接規範(WPS)。
description.en: Introduction of Welding Codes, Fundamentals of Welding, Welding Processes, Welding Equipment, Metals and Their Weldability, Evaluation of Welds, Welding Procedure Specifications (WPS) and Qualification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。產業發展與競爭，產業發展與環境，科技、市場及創新，產業生命週期，關鍵成功要素、創新需求與企業核心能力，創新環境及政策，創新與專利。
description.en: Industrial development and Industrial competition, Industrial development and environment protection, Technology, Market and Innovation Requirement Cycle, Innovation, Innovation Requirement & Know-how, Innovation and patent

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機電整合系統架構，機電整合系統之機構、感測器、驅動器與致動器、介面技術、可程式控制器應用，機電整合個案分析。
description.en: Structure of mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , application of  PLC and case study.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.
